devdoc.details: The contract receives an address `to` (expected to be a DEX router) and `data` to execute a swapThe swap data must be encoded to send tokens to `msg.sender`CreditsManager pays for the swap on behalf of the user by deducting credits from their balance

canSpendCredits(address,uint256).details: Check if a user can spend a specific amount of credits.

params._amount: The amount of credits to check.
params._user: The address of the user to check.

returns._0: True if the user can spend the specified amount of credits.

changeGovernor(address).details: Change the governor of the contract.

params._governor: The address of the new governor. TRUSTED

params._token: The ERC20 token used to swap from (e.g., sDAI on Gnosis). TRUSTED

execute(address,bytes,uint256,address).details: Execute a swap through a DEX router (Uniswap, Swapr, etc.). CreditsManager pays for the swap.

params.amount: The amount of credits to spend (tokens approved to the DEX router).
params.data: The encoded swap call data. Must be encoded to send output tokens to msg.sender.
params.outputToken: The token that the user is buying (must have increased balance after swap).
params.to: The DEX router address (must be whitelisted).

setWhitelistedContract(address,bool).details: Add or remove a contract from the whitelist.

params._contract: The address of the contract to modify.
params._whitelisted: True to add to whitelist, false to remove.

sweepTokens(address).details: Sweep all tokens from the contract to the governor.

params._token: The token to sweep. If address(0), uses the default token.

devdoc.title: CreditsManager

execute(address,bytes,uint256,address).notice: This function acts as a proxy - CreditsManager pays for the swap by deducting credits from user's balance.

userdoc.notice: This contract acts as a proxy to DEXs (Uniswap, Swapr, etc.) where users can spend trading credits
